links.*: The Tale of Aragorn and Arwen

wikitext.*:
[[File:John Howe - Aragorn 2.jpg|thumb|250px|''Aragorn'' by [[John Howe]]]]
A timeline of the life of [[Aragorn II]] in the [[Third Age]].

==[[Third Age]]==
==={{TA|2931|n}}===
*[[1 March]]: Birth of Aragorn II.<ref name="TA">{{App|TA}}</ref>

==={{TA|2933|n}}===
*Death of Aragorn's father [[Arathorn II]].<ref name="TA" />
*Aragorn's mother [[Gilraen]] takes him to [[Rivendell]] where [[Elrond]] accepts him as a foster-son and calls him [[Estel]] meaning "hope."<ref name="TA" />

==={{TA|2941|n}}===
*June: [[Gandalf]], [[Bilbo Baggins]] and [[Thorin and Company]] arrive at Rivendell.<ref name="TA" /> It is unknown whether they interact with 10-year old Aragorn.

==={{TA|2952|n}}===
*Aragorn learns his true name and ancestry from Elrond. He is given the shards of [[Narsil]].<ref name="TA" />
*Aragorn meets [[Arwen]] at woods of Rivendell.<ref name="TA" />
*Aragorn embarks into the wild on many adventures.<ref name="TA" />

==={{TA|2956|n}}===
*Aragorn meets [[Gandalf]].<ref name="TA" />

==={{TA|2957|n}}-{{TA|2980|n}}===
*Aragorn journeys throughout [[Middle-earth]].<ref name="TA" />
*Aragorn serves King [[Thengel]] of [[Rohan]] and [[Ecthelion II]], [[Steward of Gondor]], going by the name [[Thorongil]].<ref name="TA" />

==={{TA|2980|n}}===
*Aragorn defeats the [[Corsairs]] while in the service of Ecthelion.<ref name="TA" />
*Aragorn faces perils on the confines of [[Mordor]] before turning homeward.<ref>{{App|Tale}}</ref>
*Aragorn meets Arwen in [[Lothlórien]]<ref name="TA" />
*Midsummer's Eve: Aragorn and Arwen become betrothed.<ref name="TA" />

==={{TA|3001|n}}===
*Aragorn begins the search for [[Gollum]] at the request of Gandalf.<ref name="TA" />

==={{TA|3007|n}}===
*Spring: Death of Aragorn's mother Gilraen.<ref name="TA" />

==={{TA|3009|n}}===
*Aragorn and Gandalf renew their hunt for [[Gollum]].<ref name="TA" />

==={{TA|3017|n}}===
*[[1 February]]: Aragorn captures Gollum in the [[Dead Marshes]].<ref name="GY">{{App|Great}}</ref>

*[[21 March]]: Aragorn delivers Gollum to King [[Thranduil]] of the [[Woodland Realm]] to be held captive.<ref name="GY" />

==={{TA|3018|n}}===
*[[1 May]]: Aragorn meets Gandalf at [[Sarn Ford]] and learns of [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]]'s plan to leave [[the Shire]] in September.<ref name="GY" />

*[[29 September]]: Aragorn meets Frodo Baggins in [[Bree]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[30 September]]: Aragorn leads the [[Hobbits]] out of Bree.<ref name="GY" />

*[[6 October]]: Five [[Nazgûl]] attack the camp at [[Weathertop]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[13 October]]: Aragorn finds a token left by [[Glorfindel]] on the [[Last Bridge]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[20 October]]: Frodo escapes across the [[Ford of Bruinen]] to Rivendell; Aragorn and the others follow.<ref name="GY" />
*[[25 October]]: The [[Council of Elrond]]; Aragorn shows the shards of Narsil and declares his intention to go to [[Minas Tirith]].<ref name="GY" />

*[[18 December]]: Aragorn joins the [[Fellowship of the Ring|Company of the Ring]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[25 December]]: The [[Fellowship of the Ring|Fellowship]] leaves Rivendell.<ref name="GY" />

==={{TA|3019|n}}===
*[[11 January|11]]-[[12 January]]: Blizzard on [[Caradhras]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[13 January]]: The Fellowship enters [[Moria]] against Aragorn's advice.<ref name="GY" />
*[[15 January]]: Gandalf falls facing the [[Balrogs|Balrog]]; Aragorn leads the Fellowship out of Moria to the edge of Lothlorien.<ref name="GY" />
*[[17 January]]: The Fellowship are greeted by [[Galadriel]] and [[Celeborn]].<ref name="GY" />

*[[16 February]]: The Fellowship leaves Lothlorien; Aragorn receives [[Andúril's sheath]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[25 February]]: The Fellowship passes the [[Argonath]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[26 February]]: The Breaking of the Fellowship. Aragorn decides to follow the [[Uruk-hai]] who captured [[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Merry]] and [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[30 February]]: The [[Three Hunters]] meet [[Éomer]] and then travel to the edge of [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]].<ref name="GY" />

*[[1 March]]: The Three Hunters are reunited with Gandalf and set out for [[Meduseld]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[2 March]]: Gandalf and the Three Hunters arrive at Meduseld.<ref name="GY" />
*[[3 March]]: The [[Rohirrim]] retreat to [[Helm's Deep]] and the [[Battle of the Hornburg]] begins.<ref name="GY" />
*[[4 March]]: Aragorn rides out at dawn with King [[Théoden]]. The [[Huorns]] of [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]] and [[Gandalf]] arrive and the battle is won.<ref name="GY" />
*[[5 March]]: The Three Hunters are reunited with Merry and Pippin at [[Isengard]]. Aragorn takes possession of the ''palantir'' of Orthanc.<ref name="GY" />
*[[6 March]]: Aragorn is met by the [[Dúnedain]] and Elrond's sons. He reveals himself to [[Sauron]] in the ''[[Palantíri|palantir]]'' and decides to take the [[Paths of the Dead]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[7 March]]: The [[Grey Company]] arrives at [[Dunharrow]]. Aragorn takes leave of [[Éowyn]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[8 March]]: The Grey Company takes the Paths of the Dead. At midnight, Aragorn summons the [[Oathbreakers]] at the [[Stone of Erech]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[9 March]]: Aragorn sets out from [[Erech]] and comes to [[Calembel]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[10 March]]: Aragorn, leading the Dead Men and the Grey Company, crosses the river [[Ringló]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[11 March]]: Aragorn reaches [[Linhir]] and crosses into [[Lebennin]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[12 March]]: Aragorn drives the enemy towards Pelargir.<ref name="GY" />
*[[13 March]]: The Grey Company reaches [[Pelargir]] with the army of the Dead and they capture the Corsairs' fleet.<ref name="GY" />
*[[14 March]]: Aragorn sails towards Minas Tirith.<ref name="GY" />
*[[15 March]]: Aragorn sails north and arrives at the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields]]. After the battle he heals [[Faramir]], Éowyn and Merry.<ref name="GY" />
*[[16 March]]: The Captains of the West decide to march to the Black Gate.<ref name="GY" />
*[[18 March]]: Aragorn leads the army of the West out of Minas Tirith.<ref name="GY" />
*[[23 March]]: Aragorn sends those too frightened to proceed to retake [[Cair Andros]].<ref name="GY" />
*[[25 March]]: Aragorn commands the army of the West in the [[Battle of the Morannon]]. The Ring is destroyed and Sauron is defeated.<ref name="GY" />

*[[8 April]]: The [[Ring-bearers]] are honored by Aragorn and the Host of the West at the [[Field of Cormallen]].<ref name="Chief">{{App|Chief}}</ref>

*[[1 May]]: Aragorn is crowned King.<ref name="Chief" />

*[[25 June]]: Aragorn finds the sapling of the [[White Tree of Gondor|White Tree]].<ref name="Chief" />
*Midsummer's Eve: Arwen arrives in Minas Tirith. Aragorn receives the [[Sceptre of Annúminas]] signifying the Kingship of Arnor from Elrond.<ref name="Chief" />
*[[Mid-year's Day|Midsummer's Day]]: Wedding of Aragorn and Arwen.<ref name="Chief" />

*[[22 August]]: Aragorn bids farewell to the other members of the Fellowship.<ref name="Chief" />

==Fourth Age==
==={{FoA|6|n}}===
*King Elessar makes the Shire a Free Land under the protection of the [[Northern Sceptre]] and forbids Men from entering it.<ref name="Later">{{App|Later}}</ref>

==={{FoA|13|n}}===
*King Elessar makes the Thain, the [[Master of Buckland]], and the [[Mayor of Michel Delving]] Counsellors of the North-kingdom.<ref name="Later" />

==={{FoA|15|n}}===
*King Elessar and Queen Arwen come north to dwell at Annuminas. They meet with Pippin, Merry and Sam at the [[Brandywine Bridge]].<ref name="Later" />

==={{FoA|31|n}}===
*King Elessar adds the [[Westmarch]] to the Shire.<ref name="Later" />

==={{FoA|120|n}}===
*[[1 March]]: Death of King Elessar. He is succeeded by his son Eldarion.<ref name="Later" />

{{references}}
